queries.query: /* 수입정보 기간,품목,BL */ SELECT IPGO_DATE, DC_ID, F_GETDCNAME(DC_ID) DC_NAME, ITEM_ID, F_GET_ITEM_NAME(ITEM_ID), IPGO, BL_NO FROM ITEM_BL_STOCK WHERE DC_ID = '1811' AND IPGO_DATE BETWEEN REPLACE('$!{in_fr_date}','-','') AND REPLACE('$!{in_to_date}','-','') AND ITEM_ID LIKE '%'||'$!{in_item_id}'||'%' AND BL_NO LIKE '%'||'$!{in_bl_no}' ORDER BY 1 DESC, 2,4

/* 수입햄류 추적조회_재고정보 */ SELECT DC_ID, F_GETDCNAME(DC_ID) DC_NAME, STOCK FROM ITEM_BL_STOCK WHERE STOCK > 0 AND BL_NO = '$!{sel_bl_no}' AND ITEM_ID = '$!{sel_item_id}' UNION ALL SELECT DC_ID, F_GETDCNAME(DC_ID) DC_NAME, CHGO STOCK FROM DAILY_ITEM_BL_CHGO WHERE CHGO_GUBN = '재고' AND BL_NO = '$!{sel_bl_no}' AND ITEM_ID = '$!{sel_item_id}' AND CHGO > 0 ORDER BY 1

/* 수입햄류 추적조회_거래처_출고정보 */ SELECT T1.CNFM_DATE, T1.DC_ID, T4.CUST_NAME, T5.ADRS_SIDO||' '||T5.ADRS_GUGUN||' '||T5.ADRS_DONG||' '||REPLACE(T4.CUST_ADRS,T5.ADRS_DONG,'') ADRS_NAME, T4.TEL_NO, SUM(T1.CHGO) CHGO FROM DAILY_ITEM_BL_CHGO T1, SDSTT101 T4, SDSTT002 T5 WHERE T1.BL_NO = '$!{sel_bl_no}' AND T1.ITEM_ID = '$!{sel_item_id}' AND T1.CUST_CODE = T4.CUST_CODE AND T4.CUST_POST_NO = T5.POST_NO GROUP BY T1.CNFM_DATE, T1.DC_ID, T4.CUST_NAME, T5.ADRS_SIDO||' '||T5.ADRS_GUGUN||' '||T5.ADRS_DONG||' '||REPLACE(T4.CUST_ADRS,T5.ADRS_DONG,''), T4.TEL_NO ORDER BY 1, 3

SELECT TO_DATE(IPGO_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), BL_NO FROM ITEM_BL_STOCK, DUAL WHERE IPGO_DATE BETWEEN REPLACE('$!{in_fr_date}','-','') AND REPLACE('$!{in_to_date}','-','') AND BL_NO LIKE '%'||'$!{sel_bl_no}'||'%' AND ITEM_ID LIKE '%'||'$!{in_item_id}'||'%' ORDER BY 1 DESC,2

SELECT DISTINCT T2.ITEM_ID, T2.ITEM_NAME, CASE WHEN SELL_STOP_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') THEN '판매중' ELSE '판매중지' END SELL_STOP_DATE, CASE WHEN ITEM_STATUS = 'ST' AND ITYPE = 'FERT' THEN '생산가능' WHEN ITEM_STATUS = 'ST' AND ITYPE = 'HAWA' THEN '매입가능' WHEN ITEM_STATUS = 'D1' AND ITYPE = 'FERT' THEN '생산중지' WHEN ITEM_STATUS = 'D1' AND ITYPE = 'HAWA' THEN '매입중지' ELSE '확인필요' END ITEM_STATUS FROM ITEM_BL_STOCK T1, ITEM_MST T2 WHERE T1.ITEM_ID = T2.ITEM_ID AND ( ( /* 판매중 */ '$!{in_item_status}' = '01' AND SELL_STOP_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ) OR ( /* 생산/매입중 */ '$!{in_item_status}' = '02' AND ITEM_STATUS = 'ST' ) OR ( /* 판매중지 */ '$!{in_item_status}' = '03' AND SELL_STOP_DATE < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ) OR /* 전체조회 */ '$!{in_item_status}' = '00' ) AND ITYPE IN ('FERT','HAWA') [AND (T2.ITEM_ID LIKE '%'||'$!{selected_item_id}'||'%' OR ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||'$!{selected_item_id}'||'%')] ORDER BY T2.ITEM_ID
